channel.title: [FM] Fun Chaos!? ~ Everyone Won? Mafia, Medusa, Werewolf, Guardian, And Town win!
channel.description:
[color=lightgreen]Welcome[/color] = Hello folks and welcome to ~~Chaos~~ Fun game
Basically it's really a normal game but with a twist... it has a tiny pinch of **bastard**, I promise you tho that this "bastard" has nothing to do with the classes or the day/night, it's just there to add some ~~chaos~~ fun!
Also most of this game is a complete FHLUCAEOSIN. Woah that glitched bad.
[color=lightgreen] Rules[/color] =
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not screenshot private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Do not use me big boi letters me colorz 7. Editing is allowed if you are correcting grammar mistakes other than that you need me permission. Also no deleting posts. 8. You can edit quotes for the lulz but other than that no.
[color=lightgreen]Gameplay[/color] = 1. Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies 2. Nights will be 24 hour long, or shorter if everyone sent their actions in 3. Actions are done by messaging me 4. Mafia have a night chat and day chat 5. All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in your PM 6. All classes are hidden. 7. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it 8. Mafia have a factional kill
[color=lightgreen]Lynches[/color] = To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" The player at the end of the day with the most votes will get lynched. No lynches and d1 lynches are in play btw
[color=lightgreen]Journals/Deathnotes[/color] = Message me your entire journal/DN, the last draft I receive before you die/kill shall be the one displayed
[color=lightgreen]To Join[/color] = To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
Rolelist: This Rolelist is a FHLUCAEOSIN. Don't know why it keeps glitching out when I type this word tbh.
**[color=green] Unknown Town [/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Town [/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=red] Unknown Mafia[/color]** **[color=red] Unknown Mafia [/color]** **[color=red] Unknown Mafia[/color]** **[color=silver] Unknown NK [/color]** **[color=silver] Unknown Random Neutral[/color]** **/** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=silver]Unkown Random Neutral **/** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** [/color]**
Players: 1. ~~Marl~~ [color=red] Modkilled D5 was Hypnotist [/color] 2. Max 3. ~~Ashe~~ [color=supernat] Killed N2 was Medusa [/color] 4. ~~Meme~~ [color=green] Killed N3 was Bodyguard[/color] 5. Eevee 6. Shurian 7. ~~Firekitten~~ [color=red] Lynched D4 was Corrupt Mayor [/color] 8. Insanity 9. ~~Hippo~~ [color=red]Killed N1 was Private Detective [/color] 10. ~~Sam~~ [color=green] Lynched D2 was Jailor [/color] 11. Soul 12. ~~Simon~~ [color=darkblue] Lynched D3 was Werewolf [/color]
Survivors:
1. Max is [color=green] Medium [/color] 2. Eevee is [color=green] Roleblocker [/color] 3. Shurian is [color=lightpink] Guardian [/color] 4. Insanity is [color=green] Doctor [/color] 5. Soul is [color=green] Cop [/color]
Spectators: 1. Ici 2. Boss
[color=lightgreen]**Game Events:**[/color] =
[Confirmation Stage](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-fun-chaos-confirmation-stage-chaotic-confirmations-12-12/65535/41?u=htm) [Day 1 has started](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-fun-chaos-day-1-let-the-chaos-begin-12-12/65535/70?u=htm) [FK Reveals As Mayor](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-fun-chaos-day-2-a-hippo-statue-11-12/65535/90?u=htm) [Lynching Of Insanity And Start Of N1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-fun-chaos-day-3-memeguard-is-dead-9-12/65535/358?u=htm) [Resurrection Of Insanity And Death Of Hippo](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-fun-chaos-day-4-ashe-rocks-7-12/65535/363?u=htm) [Lynching Of Sam And Start Of N2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-fun-chaos-day-4-ashe-rocks-7-12/65535/1399?u=htm) Too lazy soz

item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
I actually don’t like bastard games that much. Also I hate to say it but nobody on this site has ever used bastard games for anything but “GET IT I LIED ECKS-DEE”

A good bastard game has all the bastardness be interesting, controllable and theoretically predicatable, so the players work with the bastard mechanics instead of against them
